summary.span: 包含一些类，开发人员可使用这些类为组件和用户界面生成自定义设计时行为，以在设计时配置组件。

span.span: Contains classes that developers can use to build custom design-time behavior for components and user interfaces for configuring components at design time.

summary.span: 设计时环境提供了使开发人员能够安排组件并配置它们的属性的系统。

span.span: The design time environment provides systems that enable developers to arrange components and configure their properties.

summary.span: 某些组件可能需要特定的设计时仅有的行为，才能在设计时环境中正常运行。

span.span: Some components may require specific design-time only behavior to function properly in a design time environment.

summary.span: 同时，提供自定义用户界面来帮助开发人员配置组件或复杂数据类型的值，这可能也非常也用。

span.span: It may also be valuable to provide custom user interfaces which assist developers in configuring components or the values of complex data types.

summary.span: 在此命名空间中定义的类和接口可用于生成组件的设计时行为、访问设计时服务，以及实现自定义的设计时配置接口。

span.span: The classes and interfaces defined within this namespace can be used to build design-time behavior for components, access design-time services, and implement customized design-time configuration interfaces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的类包括：The classes in this namespace include: - 一个基本 接口，可用于为特定类型的组件自定义设计时行为。A basic interface that you can use to customize design-time behavior for specific types of components. - 一个 类，该类提供一个实现 、和接口的更为复杂的设计器基类 。A class that provides a more sophisticated designer base class which implements the , , and interfaces. - 设计器接口和服务，使设计器能够支持附加功能，包括：Designer interfaces and services that enable a designer to support additional functionality, including: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 可用于自定义设计时许可证上下文管理和序列化的类： 和 。Classes that can be used to customize design-time license context management and serialization: and . - 可以扩展的简单集合编辑器： 和 。Simple collection editors that can be extended: and .
